page.title: 01DARTMOUTH ******************
page.content: { Dartmouth}lies at the mouth of the River Dart a deepwater estuary in South Devon,having a population of approximately {7,000.}It is an historic town, renowned as a holiday centre, within a designated area of outstanding natural beauty, and surrounded by picturesque towns and villages. The surrounding countryside is noted for its rolling hills,lush valleys, cliff scenery and beaches. Narrow streets, long flights of steps and quaint old houses are among the attractions of Dartmouth. The River provides breathtaking views and a fascinating panorama of activity, with the ferries, yachts, fishing boats, frigates, and even the occasional submarine on its way to the Royal Naval College.
